Method.doc:
Binds hotkeys for AutoClick

Parameters:
 * mapping - A table containing hotkey modifier/key details for the following items:
  * triggerAutoClick - Start/Stop AutoClick
Method.name: bindHotkeys
parameters: * mapping - A table containing hotkey modifier/key details for the following items:

Method.desc: Checks if this spoon is enabled and running
Method.doc:
Checks if this spoon is enabled and running

Parameters:
 * None

Returns:
 * A boolean, true if this spoon is running, otherwise false
Method.name: isRunning
returns: * A boolean, true if this spoon is running, otherwise false

Variable.desc: Clicks per second. May not work properly if set too high (above ~50). Defaults to 10.
Variable.doc: Clicks per second. May not work properly if set too high (above ~50). Defaults to 10.
